about_the_game:
This demo version includes only the first two levels, while the rest of the content is the same as the full version.

Upon waking up, you find yourself transported to the continent of Slot. You will rely on slot machines and your luck to either perish or become wealthier and stronger in your Slot adventure.

We have combined mechanics from Luck Be a Landlord and Slay the Spire. The enemies are challenging, and if you are defeated, the game is over.

During the game, you will acquire powerful symbols and magical relics, each with unique attributes and effects.

Click Spin to begin your adventure!

Features:

  • Collect and combine symbols and relics with various abilities. Defeat monsters and bosses along the adventure path.

  • Click Spin to start the slot machine and randomly generate combinations of symbols. Combined with different relics, this will produce varying attack and defense outcomes.

  • Use specific symbols to create special effects on enemies. For example, the Shepherd's Staff can turn a target enemy into a sheep.

  • Explore a new map every time, with different symbols and relics, enemies and events, and and surprises along the way.
